head.citation-title: Proceedings of 19th international conference on systems engineering, ICSEng 2008
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 94 papers. The topics discussed include: global positioning system: a case study focused on systems engineering; human-robot lunar exploration: pressurized vs. unpressurized rovers; a signal processing technique for improving the accuracy of MEMS inertial sensors; on existence of non-stationary realization of a linear multivariable control system; computation of positive realizations of singular MIMO hybrid linear systems; visualization of active suspension by robust controller in Virtual Reality Toolbox; on the development and usage of the market economy parametrical regulation; modeling of nonlinear block-oriented systems using orthonormal basis and radial; computed torque control of a quaternion based space robot; an improved recursive Frisch scheme identification algorithm; and modeling of hybrid electric vehicle all wheel drive driveline system incorporating clutch models.
